title: Aloe Vera
details: Aloe vera is known for its soothing properties and is often used in skincare.

title: Bonsai Tree
details: Bonsai trees are miniature trees that are carefully cultivated to mimic the shape of mature trees.

title: Rose Bush
details: Rose bushes are beloved for their beautiful blooms and delightful fragrance.

title: Snake Plant
details: Snake plants are hardy and can thrive in low light, making them great indoor plants.

title: Fiddle Leaf Fig
details: Fiddle leaf figs are popular for their large, glossy leaves and striking appearance.

title: Leopard Lily
details: Leopard lilies feature vibrant, spotted flowers that attract pollinators.

title: Westwood Gardens Succulents
details: These succulents are known for their resilience and unique shapes.

title: Foliage Plant
details: Foliage plants add a lush touch to any indoor space with their vibrant leaves.

title: Variety Plant
details: A mixed variety of plants to brighten up your home.

title: Spring Plant
details: These plants bloom beautifully in spring, bringing color to your garden.

title: Grass
details: Ideal for landscaping, this grass variety is both durable and attractive.

title: Succula plant
details: Succula plants are perfect for beginners and require minimal care.

title: Tulip
details: Tulips are spring-blooming perennials known for their bright, cheerful colors.

title: Rose Bouquet
details: A beautiful bouquet of roses, perfect for gifting or decorating.
